content.description: Sit start below and to the left of the stand start for Witchcraft on the obvious pinch feature in the center of the boulder (Start hold for The Monolith and Journey To Nonexistence). Move right into the start of Witchcraft.
content.location: Sit start for Witchcraft, starting on the obvious pinch feature that is the start hold for The Monolith and then moving right into Witchcraft.

content.description: Stand start around the prow to the right of the start of The Monolith on a left-hand sloper edge and a right-hand crack crimp. From the start, make a big move onto a decent sloping edge. From the edge, there are a couple of ways to do the next couple of moves and reach the last couple of holds. The easiest way is to grab a terrible crack crimp up and to the right of the sloping edge with your right hand, throw a right foot high onto a bad foothold, and then make an extremely difficult cross into a small crimp edge above the crack crimp. Slowly execute the cross so that you can let go with your right hand (locking off with your left on the crimp edge) and grab decent flake crimps over right. After that, make a big move to the top off of the flake.
content.location: Stand starts around the backside of the The Monolith boulder (to the right of the start of The Monolith) on a left-hand sloper edge and a right-hand crack.

content.description: Sit start as for Rotten Thumbnail but instead of following the crack up and right, exit left near the middle.
content.location: Sit starts as for Rotten Thumbnail.

content.description: Sit start a couple of feet to the right of Rotten Thumbnail (on the backside of the small boulder blocking the landing of Witchcraft) on a sloper edge and crack crimp. Move up and left into Rotten Thumbnail.
content.location: Sit starts a couple of feet to the right of Rotten Thumbnail on the backside of the small boulder blocking the landing of Witchcraft and moves up and left into Rotten Thumbnail.

content.description: Stand start on the arete that Crucifix starts on (to the right of Witchcraft). Work up the arete to top out by Witchcraft.
content.location: Starts to the right of Witchcraft on the arete and works the arete up.

content.description: Starts far left from The Monolith on a left hand blocky sloper and a right hand gaston with a high heel at the bottom of the Monolith Crack. Slap your way up slopers on the right to a weird crimp and then use the arete to top out
content.location: Left of The Monolith where the ground rises up a bit right along the trail

content.description: Sit start in a massive flake jug on the backside of the small boulder blocking the landing of Witchcraft. Work straight up on crack jugs to the top.
content.location: Sit starts in an obvious flake jug on the backside of the small boulder blocking the landing of Witchcraft.

content.description: Sit start down low on an obvious slanted pinch near the base of the side of the boulder facing the pathway/powerline. Move off the pinch left into a good crimp-jug, throw a heel hook on the pinch, and then get a high right hand into another crimp-jug just below the Monolith Crack. Move up into the crack to the right and top out.
content.location: Starts directly below and to the right of the Monolith Crack on the side of the boulder facing the powerline. Finishes in the Monolith Crack.

content.description: Stand start on the crimp flake just below the topout for Witchcraft. Dyno from the flake to the top.
content.location: Dynos from one of the last holds on Witchcraft to the lip and then tops out.

content.description: Stand start on the far left side of the boulder that faces the worn pathway and the powerline in a good crack. Work the crack up and right, top out where the crack ends and the boulder drops over to the right.
content.location: The obvious diagonal crack that can be seen from the worn pathway on The Monolith.

content.description: Climb through The Monolith until you hit the Monolith Crack. From the crack jug, go straight up the face utilizing an odd gaston and feet in the crack. Top out straight up. Exposed and high.
content.location: The direct top out for The Monolith, instead of exiting right in the crack.

content.description: Start as for Witchcraft and after hitting the good edge right after the start, go left into the arete and top out on Journey To Nonexistence.
content.location: Starts as for Witchcraft and then climbs into Journey To Nonexistence.

content.description: Kind of a silly problem sit starting around the around to the right of Crucifix and the downclimb. Sit start on crack edges and work up on crack edges to the top. Veer right and up towards the precarious looking horn (it won't fall off).
content.location: Sit starts to the right of Crucifix and the downclimb on the backside of The Monolith.

content.description: Project. Sit start on the obvious large pinch feature that is the start for The Monolith. Go straight up the arete using various non-holds until you reach a good horn high up. Make sure you have enough pads and a good spotter. This thing is hard and high.
content.location: Sit starts as for The Monolith but goes straight up the arete. It hasn't be done.

content.description: Sit start further right of Lemon Flavored Jesus under a small overhang on a perfectly sculpted right-hand pinch and a left-hand sidepull high up on the left. Get a high left foot by your left hand and bump up the sidepull edge until you are able to pull over the lip and onto the slab.
content.location: Sit starts to the right of Lemon Flavored Jesus under a small overhang on an obvious and perfectly sculpted pinch hold and a left-hand sidepull.

content.description: Sit start to the right of the stand start for Witchcraft on an obvious low down horn at the base of the right-hand arete. Move your left hand into an awkward gaston, and then stand up to reach a sloper edge around the arete with your right hand. Lean up and left to reach the corner of a flake feature that is one of the last holds on Witchcraft. Get a high right foot to pressure you towards the flake and cross onto it with your right hand. Make a big move off of the flake to the top edge and make a somewhat difficult mantle.
content.location: Sit starts to the right of Witchcraft at the base of the right-hand arete. Moves up and left into Witchcraft, staying slightly left of the arete.

content.description: Sit start on the flake jug that Rotten Thumbnail starts on, on the backside of the small boulder blocking the landing of Witchcraft. From the jug, skip all the holds used on Rotten Thumbnail and dyno from the start to the top. Make sure that you have a spotter - its big.
content.location: Sit starts as for Rotten Thumbnail on the backside of the small boulder blocking the landing of Witchcraft and dynos to the top.

content.description: A very large outstanding boulder just before the powerline on the left. There are several really nice problems here. Some of the problems are high-ball but have decent holds to top out on.
